hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.ZR Frogs Suns Song: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Jail Key#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #temporal stone within the Deku Tree# contains #the Bunny Hood#.
hinted_locations: Deku Tree MQ After Spinning Log Chest

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##Lake Hylia## has #2# major items.

DMT (Biggoron).text: Can you move me? I don't get great service here.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that if Link could say a few words, he'd be a better public speaker.

GC (Maze).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Saria's Song#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that within the #valley#, the crate and waterfall conceal...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to a #generic grotto#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Basement Pot 11

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Sun Block Room Chest

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that in #Goron City# the hammer unlocks #the Fire Arrows#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Recovery Heart#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##Kakariko Village## has #6# major items.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that plundering #the Shadow Temple# is a foolish choice.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #a Compass# and #the Song of Time#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Serenade of Water# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Jail Key#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that racing #Dampé's ghost# rewards...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Saria's Song#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals #3 Deku Scrubs#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #a Recovery Heart# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides the #Lon Lon Tower#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the path to #the Tower#.
